name: Snake Color: Bump Up Rise Jump
name_original: Snake Color: Bump Up Rise Jump
description:
Slither away!!!

You’re a slithery snake, and the colors are out to get you.

Do not be caught by color obstacles. Drag your finger left or right to avoid them.

You can only touch colors that are the same color as you. Look out!

Snake colors change very fast, and you need to think like a snake and act like a snake.

How to play:
*In Color Mode, image you are a happy cutie and fragile snake, your skin color will change randomly, but be careful! you are only able to cross matched colors or you Shall not pass!
Use your great reaction and choose the right way to pass different level.

*In Trouble Mode, you are much tougher than last game mode, you can impact all cubes as same color as you are. Use your powerful Strick to impact your dangerous from other cubes which have different colors.
developers: Word Puzzle & Fun Games For Free
